resources.string: 1. 10 Modules are hidden in college campus, you have to find them and attach them on the Cartilage appropriately to Win the game.
2. You have to Answer multiple choice questions(MCQs) correctly to get the locations of each Module in 30 Seconds.
3. On every Wrong Answer 1 question is skipped and you will miss 2 Modules(1 of the wrong answer and 1 of skipped question).
4. Every Module has its Unique Code and you have to enter this code to unlock next Question.
5. The Team with Maximum or all Modules Attached properly in Minimum time will Win this Hunt.
